repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:disco

# Install packages required to build AsteroidOS
RUN apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install --no-install-recommends -y git build-essential cpio diffstat gawk chrpath texinfo python2 python3 wget shared-mime-info && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Add the en_US.utf8 locale because it is required and not installed by default in minimal Ubuntu images
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y locales && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && localedef -i en_US -c -f UTF-8 -A /usr/share/locale/locale.alias en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANG en_US.utf8

WORKDIR /asteroid
